response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with excellence in mind. This product not only meets but exceeds industry standards, offering unparalleled performance and quality. Given its exceptional features and durability, it's valued at $120 by us. Considering its worth and the benefits it provides, I am extending this opportunity to you for the same price. I believe you'll find immense value in it. Let me know if you're interested in exploring this further!", "product_price": 120}
